billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Allows the placement of fresh cut evergreen trees in public buildings and governmental facilities
summary: Provides an exemption to certain uniform fire prevention and building code standards for public buildings and governmental facilities by allowing the placement of fresh cut evergreen trees therein.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to certain uniform fire prevention and building code standards
